Stijn van Cuijk

This is the personal website of Stijn van Cuijk. A designer currently studying Industrial Product Design at the HAN. Stijn likes to practice his design approach in many different fields. The main focus lies on the process and a way of thinking. Everything can be designed.

Currently enrolled in Co-Design Studio, a full-time minor in human centered design, working for real clients with coaching by experienced design professionals.

Arnhem, Netherlands
